channel.title: Html5
channel.description: would html5 be any improvement to rsc? what exactly would be difference

item.title: Html5
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:11, topic:460182”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=563098.msg4106966#msg4106966 date=1348096839]

[quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=563098.msg4106874#msg4106874 date=1348091638]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=563098.msg4106873#msg4106873 date=1348091525]

[quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=563098.msg4106850#msg4106850 date=1348090665]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=563098.msg4105126#msg4105126 date=1347895978]

[quote author=da real hype link=topic=563098.msg4104809#msg4104809 date=1347843017]
obv but what advantages would u see having html5 for the forums part. less flaws in it? etc…

all i really want is pros and cons of html5 vs what we currently have in rsc. doesnt mean the game means everything as a whole.[/quote]Literally the only difference is that you don’t need to have Java installed to play…
[/quote]It’s a completely different “platform”.
[/quote]Which is why you don’t need Java installed to play…

Other than that there is no difference.
[/quote]If you used WebGL, it wouldn’t work on a lot of computers/browsers without GPU acceleration and if you ported the 2D canvas draw, it would be a lot slower. It would also have to use WebSockets.
[/quote]WebGL wouldn’t really be a port seeing the Java version isn’t using OpenGL at all…

I doubt there would be any performance issues with 2D canvas… It can handle much more intensive games just fine.

Also, so what if it uses websockets? That’s accounted for with the port to ‘html5’.

What you’re basically pointing out are implementation details, which aren’t the type of differences the OP wants to know…
[/quote]The 2D implementation would probably be slow. Most of the resource intensive games use webgl.[/quote]RSC isn’t resource intensive… It would be just fine, and run well over 20fps.

Read full topic

item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“da real hype, post:3, topic:460182”]i saw rs2 have a side by side pic of their java and html5 and it looked much better so i was jw why

but still wonderin if it would be a big improvement. from what we have today. forums be better etc.[/quote]They didn’t just port it over… They obviously made changes while they were re-writing it.

If they ported it over without any changes, it would look the same.
